SEARCH
Package ReliableMulticast.Receiver

Class ReceiverWorker

java.lang.Object
ReliableMulticast.Receiver.ReceiverWorker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ReceiverWorker extends Object implements Runnable
The ReceiverWorker class is responsible for processing received containers in a separate thread. It unpacks the containers, adds them to a map, and reconstructs the data when all containers for a specific data ID are received.
